Digital as a public service

ProudCity lets municipalities of all sizes easily launch and manage their government digital services all in one place.

Get started

The web platform for today's government

Mobile-friendly

ProudCity's fully responsive design gives residents a great experience on mobile, tablet and desktop. Your website will be user-friendly and beautiful no matter what device they use to access your city services.

Cloud hosting, full support

ProudCity is a fully-managed, cloud-based, software-as-a-service platform with 99.9% uptime and guarantee 24/7 phone support so you can focus on more important work.

Payments

Our simple payment tool allows residents to pay fees and fines easily and quickly. Alternatively, we can integrate or link to your current systems.

Content management

ProudCity is built on top of a proven, flexible, enterprise-class content management system, empowering city staff to easily update their websites, complete with workflows that ensure publishing follows protocol for sharing and archiving public information.

Social media wall

Highlight all your city government social media activity -- such as Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and YouTube -- on one interactive wall and make it easier for residents to follow and connect with you via these channels.

Services map

Highlight city services -- fire, police, schools, parks, city administration -- on a pre-populated map so residents can better locate and visualize public services.

see all features »

Integrations

ProudCity integrates with (a growing list of) applications, making it easy to add popular and civic-specific services to your digital government platform.

SeeClickFix

Create new issue, lookup issue, view issues on map

Stripe

Process online payments and automate the payment processing workflow

Google Analytics

View traffic details and site trends directly from the administration dashboard

Twitter

View social media across multiple accounts on a social wall

see all integrations »

 

About ProudCity 

We empower governments to proudly serve their residents and build a stronger sense of civic pride.

We believe

  • civic pride stems from a love of where you live
  • governments want to serve proudly
  • through open, responsive digital services, residents and governments can co-create cities they love and are proud of
